Name: Nakornsampan
About the game: Nakornsampan is a match-3 city building game that let's you build functional, self-sustaining city. Upgrade the building by placing 3 of them next to each other. Take care of their requirement. Plan your city to satisfy all buildings. Unlock new buildings, event, every week. Discover different map with unique features.
